website_summaries.verdict: This probiotic supplement is designed to promote gut health and balance the good bacteria in the gut.
pros: Contains one billion lactobacillus sporogenes bacteria
Digestive-calming herbal blend, with ginger, peppermint, and turmeric
Several users report improvement in GI symptoms such as bloating and gas when this product is used
cons: Some users report upset stomach, burping, or other GI distress with use

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy I had this along
customer_reviews.text: I used these when I was traveling out of the country and staying in homestays in other countries and eating whatever I was served (little fiber and protein, lots of oil and salt...etc). I stopped taking it one time and immediately noticed an uncomfortable difference. I am very happy I had this along.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic ever!
customer_reviews.text: This has made a difference for me. I used to take 6+ fiber tablets and sometimes that would not even help my digestive issues. I stopped that completely and now take just 1-2 of these a day......perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Drake

customer_reviews.title: Really Work - Great Brand!
customer_reviews.text: Great difference in my digestion! I've been taking these about a year and they seem to really help me fight off illness. Even had a mild stomach flu last year that was shorter and less in duration. I attribute probiotics to this. I take other Rainbow Lite products and they are good since Gluten Free and natural. I've got family members taking these now.

customer_reviews.title: These work exactly as advertised. If you are health conscious I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed that these sit better in my stomach as opposed to the generic store bought brand. I've been vegan for years and it never occurred to me that the probiotics I'm taking could be not so vegan friendly. I immediately felt a difference and feel these to be much more effective. It's helped me maintain my weight and I could lose weight if I wanted to. My bowels have regular movement and I have virtually no bloating and no constipation anymore. I'm happy with this purchase and will likely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Saved my stomach!
customer_reviews.text: I take one of these and one the Rainbow Light Enzyme pills right before I eat dinner and I no longer get sick after eating! I was taking a nexium every day and still having horrible stomach pains and horrible indigestion. The pain would be so bad sometimes it hurt from my stomach they to my back. After reading reviews on here I decided to try this and the enzymes and it has saved my stomach! As long as I take them with my food I am like 100% better!

customer_reviews.title: Not enough, but I knew that
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint about this product is that there is not enough power....we are always recommended 14 parts per billion as a minimum, but I bought this for the pairing idea of pre-biotics with the pro-biotics! THAT, is a great idea! The caplets are tiny, and I really think the manufacturer could have upped the size to incorporate more into the mix. I do not, however, know their philosophy on that as it's not described, so they may have a reason? All in all a nice little caplet for a boost to the system that is easy on it, and easy to swallow as well. Being unable to find the combo again, I would re-order...

customer_reviews.text: I use to get occasional constipation. I would take Swiss Kriss (an herbal laxative) to help. I came across these and read about what I could change in my diet to make my body more regular. I started taking these and cut out coffee and added more fruits and veggies to my diet and on day 2 I noticed a huge difference! I'm very happy with these. I also take Rainbow Light women's one a day. They just make great viatmins that I trust have good stuff in them.

As a vegan, I appreciate the fact that these supplements are animal derivate and cruelty-free. I will continue to purchase Rainbow Light products for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Trixx

customer_reviews.title: TMI? Beware this honest review LoL
customer_reviews.text: In high school, I suffered from an eating disorder involving laxatives and it seriously damaged my digestive system. After relying on them for so long, once I stopped taking them, my body forgot how to pass anything naturally so I started struggling with constipation, hemorrhoids, and just over all painful digestion. These probiotics saved my butt, quite literally, but also my mental health. They are gentle and totally safe and healthy. I would recommend them to absolutely anyone! I even got my family to start taking them. If I hadn't found these I might've fallen back into my old, unhealthy habits, so I owe Rainbow Light a huge thank you! (I also take their women's multivitamin and love them!)

customer_reviews.text: Rainbow light Probiotic has a prebiotic as well as a probiotic component,so it helps my entire digestive tract. Probiotic: Lactobacilicus sporogenes ( 1 billion) Prebiotic: Inulin 25g Larch arabinogatactin 25mg Digestive Support: Ginger Fresh Juice 10:1 Extract 20mg, Fennel seed powde 20mg, Tumeric 50:1 Extract 15mg and Pppermint leaf powder 15mg. It is sometimes hard to read the product lables on Amazon so I hope this helps. At home I use it as a compliment to my old standby brand that has some different strains in it ,but is a refrigerated variety. I thinkthe Rainbow Light Probio 1b is a very solid product and It is the one I always take wih me when I travel.

product_meta.title: Rainbow Light - ProBio Active - Food-Based Probiotic Supplement Supports Gastrointestinal Health, Digestive and Immune Health; Shelf-stable, Vegan, Gluten-Free - 90 vCaps
product_meta.description: ProBio Active 1B delivers Bio-Active Probiotic Defense, a unique multifunction strain of Lactobacillus Sporogenes that are 100% viable with a unique outer layer that protects their delivery through the stomach and into the intestines where they promote healthy flora lost due to stress, poor diet, some medications or other factors.* Lactobacillus Sporogenes has been extensively studied to support common digestive discomforts, encourage intestinal health, support healthy digestion and immune health.* 50 mg of prebiotic support promotes regularity, the growth of "friendly" bacteria and inhibits the growth of undesirable organisms in the digestive tract.* A soothing botanical blend, equivalent to 985 mg herbal powder, of ginger, fennel, peppermint and turmeric supports digestive health, alleviates stomach aches, gas and bloating.
feature_bullets: PROBIOTIC: Contains Bio-Active Probiotic Defense, a unique multifunction strain of 1 billion Lactobacillus Sporogenes that are 100% viable with a unique outer layer that protects delivery through the stomach and into the intestines where they are broken down to support optimal digestion, absorption of nutrients, and removal of toxins and wastes
PROMOTES CALM: Calming botanicals of ginger, fennel, peppermint and turmeric
VEGAN: This product is vegan. Contains NO: gluten, wheat, milk, tree nuts, peanuts, soy, eggs, fish or shellfish.
